summary: net: wwan: iosm: fix memory leak in ipc_mux_init()
details:
net: wwan: iosm: fix memory leak in ipc_mux_init()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.13 by commit e21478d0054f63eec7ce833296cf9788764a0ec7, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit 1f52d7b622854b8bd7a1be3de095ca2e1f77098e. For more details please see the references link.
